page.title: 03BLACKO COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: This school, previously not an efficient one was reopened on December 6th. 1875 under the Barrowford and District School Board as a Mixed Half Time School. Present on the day of opening, including Half Timers, were 113 children.The date stone on the school is 1889.{BLACKO SCHOOL}is a small village school near the junction of Beverley Road and Gisburn Road. There are three rooms, one is used as a hall and infant area, the other two are classrooms for junior age children (7-11years). There are 38 children in the school. The teaching staff is{ {HEADTEACHER}-Mr. J.C Wright. {INFANT TEACHER}-Mrs S. Stephenson. {PART TIME TEACHER }-Mrs. J. James. Other staff include Cook, Caretaker, Secretary, and Non-teaching assistant. The school day starts at 9.00 a.m. and finishes at 3.30 p.m.
